name: express-initializers
description: An Express App initializer pattern to tame large apps.

scripts.test: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint index.js lib/*.js test/*.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R spec -r should
scripts.coverage: node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint lib/*.js test/*.js test/fixtures/*.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -r blanket -R html-cov > coverage.html && open coverage.html

author: Jacob Gable <jacob.gable@gmail.com>
